oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LARGE-ANGLE PARABOLIC EQUATION METHODS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kirby, James T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: large angle parabolic equation
parabolic equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Large-angle parabolic equation methods for the propagation of surface water waves are discussed. The methods described here are limited to forms which are solvable by the Crank-Nicolson method, but are successful in opening the allowed range of propagation directions to ~ 50Â° with respect to normal incidence.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 20 (1986): Proceedings of 20th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Taipei, Taiwan, 1986.; 32
